name: Tanay Mishra
title: Software Engineer
bio: Detail-oriented full stack developer passionate about creating intuitive user experiences. Focused on building scalable applications with modern technologies. Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with industry trends.

description: Working on Packaging and Distribution of AlloyDB Omni on multiple cloud marketplaces
Leading the implementation of CI/CD pipelines for streamlined deployment
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize performance and security
Improved application performance by 30% through code optimization
Implemented new features that increased user adoption by 25%
Optimized database queries resulting in 40% faster report generation

experience.description: Contributed to adding new features to one of company's user facing product.

projects.name: Desktop Application - Monolith Architecture
description: Working on a cross-platform desktop application which uses Qt/PyQt library for GUI development.
Have hands-on experience of low level design, working with various design patterns on daily basis.
My responsibilities include introducing new features to the application and implementing performance enhancements.

projects.name: Microservices (Eagleview)
description: Have experience of working with Microservices written in Golang using AWS resources like SQS / DynamoDB / PostgreSQL and more
Worked on the service which used to handle authentication of API requests coming to any microservice of the organisation using Okta.
Worked on setting up database migration service for the Authentication product
